file_content.text: Rest assured, we'll reinforce the defenses of those shield generators.
You've done it. The shields are still holding.
That was a near-disaster I wouldn't care to repeat, but it seems Axial Park won't fall to the Republic.
The Republic is dangerous when it's desperate. And each loss makes it more so.
Don't get too comfortable.
You're right, but we'll be ready for them.
An optimistic view.
I'm sure of it. We'll be ready if they try this again.
This "near-disaster" wouldn't have happened if you had more units defending those shield generators.
No thanks to you.
I'm afraid we must disagree on the subject of my judgment. But I thank you for your candor.
Long live the Emperor.
You must protect those shield generators!
What's the situation, General?
Something going on?
Ah, my lord. Observe--babes to the slaughter.
Ah, hunter. You should appreciate this more than most.
Officer. Witness the downfall of the Republic--hubris.
Ah... join me. You're just in time for the massacre.
The shields protecting Axial Park are quite impenetrable, but these Republic fools keep trying. And my men keep picking them apart.
General! We're taking heavy damage from Republic sapper droids! And not the shields, sir--they're going after the shield generators!
What's your status, soldier?
Details! Now!
They hit us hard and fast. By the time we realized they were targeting the generators, our defenses were shot.
Pull it together, trooper.
Begging your pardon, but I got sapper droids detonating all around me!
Blast! I should've known this was too good to last.
I'm down to a dozen guys, and the generators are taking heavy damage. Sir--if they fail, the whole shield comes down.
So much for your easy victory, general.
To the slaughter, huh?
This is impossible. You defend those generators, trooper! You hear me? With your last breath!
Trying our best sir, but they've already suffered heavy damage. We go down, shields go with us.
And the Republic advances through Axial Park unhindered. We have to protect those generators!
The shields will not fall. But I will not forget your failure to manage this yourself, general.
I will clean up your mess.
I understand, my lord.
Wily foes, these Republic forces. But let us see if their wiles stand up to mine.
Clever--but not clever enough.
Thank you, my lord.
This is what you might call a seller's market. And this seller doesn't come cheap.
I suppose I could help...
Yes, yes--you'll have your credits. Just stop that Republic vermin before the shields collapse!
My duty's to the Empire--in the shadows, or on the battlefield. Those shields won't fall, general.
I'm on it.
Your dedication gives me hope.
All will die before me.
Crush every Republic man and droid on that battlefield. Make them rue this.
Here they come again! Private! Get some fire on those--!
This is your army. You find a solution.
Leave me out. [Refuse Quest]
Blast! Trooper, you hold that position, or you'll answer to me!
Pardon--I have a rather sensitive engagement on my hands.
